```py
>>> df_empty = pd.DataFrame({'A' : []})
>>> df_empty
Empty DataFrame
Columns: [A]
Index: []
>>> df_empty.empty
True 
```

```py
>>> df = pd.DataFrame({'A' : [np.nan]})
>>> df
 A
0 NaN
>>> df.empty
False
>>> df.dropna().empty
True 
```

```py
>>> ser_empty = pd.Series({'A' : []})
>>> ser_empty
A    []
dtype: object
>>> ser_empty.empty
False
>>> ser_empty = pd.Series()
>>> ser_empty.empty
True 
```
